website_summaries.verdict: Two big, mason jar filled soy candles with 100% essential oils, one lavender and one eucalyptus and mint.
pros: Made in small batches by a family-owned business in the USA, these luxury candles have a refreshing scent that infuses the home with a welcoming fragrance
Non-toxic with a cotton wick, they have a burn time of 40 hours each
cons: These are more expensive than many other sets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell and product!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are so beautifully crafted! They smell delicious and the fact that I’m burning soy candles makes me feel better about having them in my house. It even comes with a wick snuffer! Will definitely be buying again from this family owned business!!
customer_reviews.author: Seana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Candles
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of your wondeful candles! I first ordered for my mother-in-law as a Christmas gift and was actually able to take a look before wrapping it. The presentation and aroma were awesome ... she loves her candle, too! My second purchase was for my daughter for Mother’s Day ... she got right back to me on how much she loves them! Was just wondering what to get for my mother-in-law for her fast approaching birthday and was reminded of your candles through a sweet email from your company ... these make the perfect gift! Many thanks and blessings!
customer_reviews.author: M & A Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Presents well as gift
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen these burn because I gave them as a gift, but the notes I do have are: -The geranium scent is very perfumy and reminds me of rose scents from major candle chains -The lavender scent is nicely balanced and softened by the lemongrass -The actual candle amount seems to be just larger than a tennis ball. I guess I expected a little bigger -They come packaged with a wick Dipper and present very well as a gift -The initial scents upon opening are very concentrated so you need to let them breathe for a minute before you can truly smell them
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting candles that make your home smell cozy
customer_reviews.text: Long-lasting, great-smelling candles. My one praise for these candles is they seem to burn for SO long! I especially adore the sangria one. The pumpkin candle is advertised as "spicy pumpkin" but really it's just a normal pumpkin, no spice (which is fine by me I'm not picky). I love that they came with a flame extinguisher - I now use that for every single candle I own! I know that's just a simple device but it works so well for preventing that smoking smell you get from blowing out the candle. I'd love to try out other candles in this line but it is a little expensive for my budget.
customer_reviews.author: maple

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling highest quality candles EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted me almost a year (I don't burn candles that often). The scent can fill my entire studio apartment without being overwhelming. I can't say enough good things about these candles. I also love the little wick dipper that came with them! These would make a great gift. I'm buying this again right now because I love them so much. They just make a house or apartment feel more "clean" with their refreshing scents and make me feel so happy and relaxed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Candles Ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are my new favorite candles. I debated before buying these because they were more expensive than just the regular candles you can find in the store, but I could not be happier with this purchase. These are the best smelling candles I’ve ever had. Sometimes I’ll even think they’re lit because I can smell them, but they’re not, they’re just that amazing! It smells like Christmas in our home right now and it’s all because of these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Edlin

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Candles
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this 2-pack for Christmas gift. My friend, who loves candles, was THRILLED. The Mason jars are reusable. But the best part is the fragrance. It is so refreshing. Not overpowering as some candles can be. It was well packaged. And the customer service and follow-through is extraordinary. I'm happy to recommend purchasing the candles from Ocotillo Southwest. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These candles had a beautiful fragrance, smelled very real and natural. Comes with a metal stick for extinguishing the wick for a smokeless effect when putting out the candle. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive sinuses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these while looking for candles that used essential oils rather than synthetic scents, since those tend to bother my sinuses and give me headaches. These were great. Very pleasant scents that left my house smelling fresh. They didn't cause sinus irritation for me like many other candle brands do. 4 stars because I thought the $30 price was a little high for the size of candle you're getting. Otherwise, pleased with this purchase. The duo pack that I purchased would make a lovely gift. Packaged very nicely and came with a sweet wick dipper to avoid smoke when you're ready to put out the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bompadre

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough to Eat
customer_reviews.text: The hot apple cider and pumpkin spice are my favorites, so far. Extremely delicious aroma. So tired of buying candles that don't smell like anything. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: shih tzu lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this set for my Mom - she loved the candles so much I had to get her a second pair after she used up the others. I'm deducting a single star from the review because the candles burn quickly, almost too quick given the price of the candles. I really wish they were perhaps twice the size as they are. Still, Mom loves them, so I'll probably be including this in my Mothers Day/Christmas gifts to her for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: I am a repeat customer and I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely candles with wonderful scents. I will order from them again! Great gift item too! I bought a set for my MIL and our home and I’m glad I did. Love them! Update: I’ve now purchased Lavender & mint/eucalyptus any they are awesome. ESP M/E
customer_reviews.author: ACreview

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised when I received the candles. The packaging was well presented and durable, the candles are beautiful and the smell is addictive! The whole house smells like Autumn and I will be ordering more as gifts and for myself! These are the best candles I have every purchased! Great gifts for the Holidays!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Great candles
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these so far, and despite burning them for longer than I know I should..... They're really lasting! Will buy again. The scent strength is just right, not super creamy for the vanilla or overpowering on the pine, just enough to remind you it's there.
customer_reviews.author: M Strang

customer_reviews.title: I love my Way Out West Candles
customer_reviews.text: I love my Way Out West Candles! This is my second order so far. Not only are the scents unique, but the pleasant aromas linger long after blowing out the candle. My favorite so far has been the Eucalyptus Mint with rosemary containing REAL essential oil. The candles do not produce excess smoke or leave black around the rim like most candles do when you blow them out. Not to mention long burn times make them more than worth the money! I highly recommend them as a gift to family, friends, or to yourself!!! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Candles
customer_reviews.text: I admit to being a "candle snob". Meaning? It Really upsets me when I use hard earned money to purchase a candle that smells wonderful ~ Then get home, light the candle to discover that unless you are standing next to the candle the fragrance is close to non-existent! The other thing that upsets me? Candles that burn "unevenly"! $20/$30 wasted on a candle that burns directly down the center...and goes out. Or candles that the wick burns hot & fast ~ majority of the candle "wax" left, but the wick is buried deep in the wax. This company & their candles are Amazing!! Folks? Don't hesitate to purchase candles from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Verhagen

customer_reviews.title: Quality candles with wonderful scents!
customer_reviews.text: These candles both have a wonderful scent, though by far our favorite is the winterberry pine. They are a good quality candle, slow burning and came in a nice box for gifting. I will enjoy them throughout the winter season.
customer_reviews.author: lvd Zwaag

customer_reviews.title: This is not what I thought I was getting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on the questions and answers in the reviews. Since it does not say how many ounces it is, I based my purchase on a questions that asked how many ounces it was, and the answer was 14oz. My jars are 8 oz, and I would not have purchased had I known they were only 8 oz. jars. I could have gotten it cheaper from another source. You need to make clear these jars are only 8 oz. each.
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Drye

customer_reviews.title: Smells like the BEST of the Fall Season!
customer_reviews.text: These have got to be among the best aroma candles made. They last quite a long time and the pumpkin spice candles bring all the delights of the fall season to you. This is what Thanksgiving smells like! The jars are also attractive , even if you do not light the candles. I like them so much I hav already ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Paxton

customer_reviews.title: These are worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself, but they are packaged perfect for gifting. The jars are real Mason jars and have a pretty little filigree charm tied around the neck of the jar. I love woodsy-holiday type scents and this pinion & pine combo is amazing. It's like a freshly cut Xmas tree lot and native American incense combined. It's fantastic. These candles burn clean and even. No black spot collected on the jar during burning at all. I will 100% buy from this candle maker again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Best Candles Out There
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have been a lifelong Yankee Candles user, never thought I would switch. These candles completely changed my mind. I don't know how the Ocotillo family does it but these little candles are so fragrant and pleasant that I can't wait to order more. If you are considering ordering some Way Out West, just do it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles
customer_reviews.text: These are the best candles I have used in a long time. The scent is very pleasant without being overpowering. I love the little snuffer tool they come with as well. Very attractive for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are simply the best candles that I’ve ever bought. I have bought six different fragrances and have loved every single one. I have even bought them as gifts for friends and family and they enjoy them as well and they always ask where they could buy more. These throw out the most fragrance of any other candle on the market , One candle fills up my whole place with the wonderful fragrance, making my place warm and inviting . These candles are simply the best!!! and I will continue ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gifts at reasonable price - but be sure to keep some for yourself!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving these candles as a gift and experiencing how pleasant and long lasting the scent is as well as the candle itself lasts, i’ve ordered several to keep on hand for gifts. The response of everyone I give them to is totally positive. They are priced at a reasonable amount too. I hope they remain available in the future. (I especially love the eucalyptus/mint)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Scent
customer_reviews.text: For being small candles, they burned what seemed like for a week with a great scent that just brings holiday memories
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They smell like Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: They smell GREAT. I love these candles and they smell awesome. I love the Winterberry Pine candle the most. The mason jars are cute and the candle seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Colonna's

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, natural fragrance —not overpowering-and they came beautifully wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Am really impressed with the quality of these candles. Very nice, natural fragrance —not overpowering-and they came beautifully wrapped. A great gift! You won’t go wrong buying these as a stocking stuffer for a candle enthusiast!!
customer_reviews.author: Timoteo Kilkes

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended: )
customer_reviews.text: everything exactly as described, highly recommended :) -bought again as gift-burns long, clean, prepared with love Great long burning candles-a clean, comforting and peaceful glow from a sustainable multi-use crop-really like the simple pleasure of 'holistic' candles like these-no smoke, no residue, so pure and clean, and they burn long-and they're 'local', not mass produced so our planet, the user and the producer all benefit-great company
customer_reviews.author: nevermind

customer_reviews.title: Overrated and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I do like the packaging but these candles are overrated and overpriced IMO. That said they are packaged to make a nice gift. I actually prefer the scent of the Glade scented candles and they are a fraction of the cost of these. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These really are the BEST lavender candles! Thanks to those who gave honest and positive reviews, I ordered two sets (4 candles). YES, these candles have a long-lasting and REAL lavender scent. The lavender in my flower beds is covered with snow right now, yet I can have the same great aroma with wonderful lavender candles from the "Way Out West Collection" by Ocotillo Southwest. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candle - lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: These two candles were packaged so beautifully. Would make great gifts! Love how they have the little medallion attached to the jar...so pretty. The vanilla scent is not too strong but throws the right amount of scent into the room. I am still burning it so I don't know about the longevity. I am holding on to the pine candle until fall. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles so much I reordered a second set
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles so much I reordered a second set. They burn clean and in the cutest jars and smell amazing. I finally found some soy candles I can enjoy. If you are sick of black smoke and smelly candles I highly recommend you try these. I love that it is a family owned business. Utterly delightful candles. FOUR thumbs up👍👍👍👍❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Sandor

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set and would be a great gift, I loved the packaging you get a lot for your money. The candles are wonderful they smell so good without being too much. I ordered some more today!
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Smelling Handmade Candle
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! A handmade shop on amazon is amazing. These candles not only smell great but are beautifully packaged. These will be perfect for valentine’s day dinner to set a “mood”. ❤️ Definitely recommend and will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rock

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell amazing and they last. My home will have a very festive fragrance this year! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two too cute!
customer_reviews.text: The candles are impressive. The package they arrived in was well thought out as they were secured and unlikely to break. The mason jars are too cute and the jar tag is a great touch. I like the smell of each of these candles, not overpowering just a subtle hint in the air. I also enjoy the snuffer it came with - another nice touch. Overall quite pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I first received two of these candles last Christmas in a gift box and I have ordered several more since for myself and as gifts. The holiday scents are strong enough to fill my space while the lavender and linen are subtle enough for smaller rooms. Love these candles and I am a true candle snob!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely purchase again and gift again!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift. Great packaging- love the touch of the snuffer! Have been told they smell wonderful. May invest in a few for myself!! Would purchase again!! Great option to give as a gift - nicely packaged .
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Smell sucks
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these but after using them a couple of times I can't stand the smell anymore. They don't smell good and are too strong to be relaxing. Save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated.......Excellent Product (Don't buy it...waste of money.)
customer_reviews.text: Very, very weak scent. I have to stand over flame to smell it. I will stick with Bath & Body Works 'Fresh Balsam' candle. It does have nice packaging. 3 Jan 2017: Updated....Ocotillo Southwest sent me replacement candle called, 'Winterberry Pine." I love it! The scent is exactly what I was looking for and fills up the room. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful. Have the apple candle burning right now and the scent and throw are amazing. I burn candles every day and these candles are the best I have had in a very long, long time. These are definitely my go to candles from now on. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas  present
customer_reviews.text: Gave to family for a Christmas present. Smells great without bring to strong. I will buy myself a set next Christmas to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: lilbit

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: While looking for things to purchase for my new house I came across these adorable candles. I love vanilla and the teal color of the other candle is going to look great in my living room. They are high-quality and they both smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and love the free wick scoop!
customer_reviews.text: These are not your ordinary overscented Christmas pine candles. They are subtle, refreshing and very fresh like the pinon forests of the southwest. Not smoky, like some that try to be incense. Just mindful of a morning walk through the pinon forests. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl1550

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Gift not given yet, but fragrances smell pure and great! Packaged well, and glass containers are classy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is Spot on
customer_reviews.text: Candles create a great aroma for small room. We use a candle lamp to "burn" candle instead of burning the wick. We have cats! Pleased with purchase...candles well presented, but small than expected. A little pricey, but overall, please with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Lane Loman

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with these candles
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these candles. I gave them to coworkers at Christmas...the aroma was very pleasant, lively and got them in the holiday spirit! They were delivered on time and no disapointment! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Julie Taylor-Omole

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome candles! Beautiful scent. Packaged wonderfully. Highly recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: ELLEN RYCHLIK

customer_reviews.title: Being able to smell the scent throughout my home.
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell amazing! I will definitely be buying more of them! I love the smell of lavender and I could smell it throughout my home! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my candles!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these candles! I initially got them as gifts for people but I loved them so much I ordered more for myself. They smell amazing and come in a cute box with a wick dipper to put them out after use. Recently, one of my candles arrived melted but I contacted the company, they sent me a new one the same day and it arrived perfectly! Makes great gifts. I will definitely be ordering more, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, pretty jars
customer_reviews.text: REALLY high fragrant candles. We have a huge living room, and the entire kitchen and living room smelled delicious. Good quality, pretty jars...made a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Patenaude

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling candle ever!
customer_reviews.text: These candles out far smell stronger than any candle I have ever bought. They burn clean and I have gotten MANY burn hours out of them. I will NEVER buy another brand again. I hope this company continues to grow their scents available!
customer_reviews.author: mikki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles are not only pretty to set out, the fragrance is delightful without being overwhelming. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: This was sent as a gift to my sister who lives out of state. She has had many compliments on them. She told me they are very good quality and smell very nice. She liked them so much and was so happy with them that I sent her another set.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Massie

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scents, long-lasting and clean burning. Love the little wire to put the flame out without smoke.
customer_reviews.author: D.B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother-inlaw for mothers day. She loved them. However i did not read the fine print, she got a thank you note, and i forgot to mark it as a gift and write a personal note, so she was a little confused when she got it. But that was all user error. The candles are great. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Anndria Terzich

customer_reviews.title: Even better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Even better than advertised! Talk about heaven in a jar! Dreamy and relaxing from the moment you pull off the lid. Intoxicating!!! Grateful!
customer_reviews.author: S.Shaffer Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pinon pine brings back fond memories
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in New Mexico and there is nothing like the smell of a piñon pine fire. When I found these candles I bought two...one for my brother and one for me. I wasn't disappointed and he was surprised Christmas morning. Pretty candle that smells delicious and brings back so many fond memories.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles and would recommend them to anyone. Smell great!
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the Way Out West Collection of Candles.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Way Out West Candles. They smell so good and look so good sitting on my kitchen counter. I would definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki LaRoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Well and attractively packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely candles! Perfect for a gift as they are packaged. Essential oils come through pleasingly. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: mthomas

customer_reviews.title: love one, other is too strong for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Natural Geranium Sweet Orange & Lemongrass Lavender - LOVE the latter one but the geraniun scent overpowers the orange in the first. It's a bit too much for me. However the candles themselves are wonderful, jar is reusable, and I will likely try more scents in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Not a soy candle, but a parrafin blend
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a soy candle but is actually a blend between parrafin and soy. I’m not sure what the point of that would ever be. People buy soy candles to avoid parrafin.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Too small for the money. Don't burn 4 hour's but Sangria is Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Sangria and the pumpkin smell's like pumpkin. I love the Sangria wish it would of been both Sangria. But its a good deal could be bigger. Yankee Candle's are 22$ and have a much longer burn time. The Sangeria smell's great but for 25$ I want a big 1 not 1 that burn's 4 hour's. Give me a Big Sangria. ... Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend. They smell so good the next set will be for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a spa!
customer_reviews.text: These candles make my room smell like a spa - exactly what I wanted! Thank you for delivering on your claim.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Niermann

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my sister
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a christmas gift for my sister and she loved them, they smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: ... candles from various places and have never been 100% satisfied until now
customer_reviews.text: I have bought candles from various places and have never been 100% satisfied until now. These candles not only burn clean, but keep my house smelling great. They have a variety in scents for everyone. I love how I can light one for an hour or just uncover it in a room. The scents are not over powering, but get the point across. Love love love these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bustillos

customer_reviews.title: So attractive
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM! I bought an additional 4. 1 each for my daughter in laws. 1 for my great aunt and an additional set for me. I just came down with a cold and the rosemary and mint helps with the cough. They are on all 4 of us buy again list!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Coman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifting but...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and they come in wonderful little quaint box. I just wish they hadn't sealed the box with the sticker and left it on the side instead. I like to check the contents of anything I order before gifting to make sure nothing is broken, but now that the seal has been broken, I'm afraid I have to find another box.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Smells So Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The scented candles smell wonderful, and the entire product is beautiful, including the packaging. Would make a lovely gift too.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: but it has a great aroma that lasts
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit pricey, but it has a great aroma that lasts. I am a therapist and I let it burn for about 30 minutes when a session starts and the lavender contributes to a more relaxing setting. Some of the reviews claimed it burned too fast. I have not found the burn time to be unsatisfactory. I will be a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Inmyhumbleopinion

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass package but no smell
customer_reviews.text: It is worthless as far as fragrant, nice glass that's it and overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a sick relative! These were a BIG HIT!!!! She absolutely LOVED THEM~
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Metzger

customer_reviews.title: worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a gift. They loved them from the very start. Smell great and so far have lasted pretty well. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: These candles are my favorite candles bc the scent is so sweet and you cant get enough of it. They are quick to ship them out and arrive fairly early. The box it comes in is really cute with a little thank you note. I would recommend anyone to try these candles if they haven't already.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Resnick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much! The smells are amazing and they’re the perfect size for where I want them displayed when they’re not burning. I love the jar and charm design as well and the wick dipper included was a great touch too. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift and the receiver loved them. They smell nice, are very pretty. I love the little heart piece that came with it and the design around the candle. I will be ordering some for myself as well. They are a small candle, looks bigger in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible scent, like a bad version of how original scents are supposed to be like. You're Better off getting something from a reputable brand than this crap. Sadly this was a gift I bought for someone and now I'm embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wick snuffer is a nice extra. I bought these as Christmas gifts and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality and attention to detail on these candles! The wick snuffer is a nice extra. I bought these as Christmas gifts and look forward to sharing them with my friends! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: N2

customer_reviews.title: Great candles!
customer_reviews.text: The candles are great smelling. The containers are very nice. I will order again. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: gloria thompson

customer_reviews.title: These candles are amazing! I've been burning them over the last few ...
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing! I've been burning them over the last few days and they smell wonderful and continue to smell the whole time they are burning. It even lingers after for awhile! I can't wait to try all the other scents! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus and Michelle Tobey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The scents of these candles are delicate and refreshing. I used the candles at night when I was knitting for relaxation.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging and decorative accent - the candles burn clean, with an excellent fragrance. They are somewhat pricey for the size, but would make a nice gift.

customer_reviews.title: nothing comes close!
customer_reviews.text: these smell of these are wonderful, i repeat do not be hesitate to buy, great for setting the mood. if you are some one who suffers from strong smells these may or may not be best for you but atleast give them a try!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: These candles were a gift and the recipient loved them. The smell was amazing and the packaging added just the right touch to it.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy smelling
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Bought as a gift but kept the red one for myself lol The seller did reach out to make sure I was happy with my purchase and were very friendly.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Candles
customer_reviews.text: Awesome candles and scents. Well made and beautiful mason jars. Personal note from the company was very pleasant and professional. I would buy all my candles from this company.

customer_reviews.title: Natural soy candle made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised by the presentation of these two candies. Most importantly, you can actually smell the fragrance, love the apple cider. We will be ordering again. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: ... am not a big candle person but I am happy I kept these
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big candle person but I am happy I kept these. They smell really good and I like the mason jar they come in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was doing my research for a candle with longevity and great scent. I have found it. So worthwhile! I will be getting different ones soon. I'd purchased the Piñón Pine and Vanilla de leche. Both great. My favorite being Vanilla de Leche thus far. Thank you Way Out West!

customer_reviews.title: Nice aroma candles
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 2 candles a week ago. They have a nice aroma, not overwhelming the senses. They give the room a pleasant smell.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful container
customer_reviews.text: The candles are BEAUTIFUL and their scent lasts a long time. I bought them as gifts, then bought myself some.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. We used one candle at Christmas and our ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. We used one candle at Christmas and our guests loved the wonderful scent. Saved one to use at the beach house this summer...the mixture of sea air and will remind us of many beautiful nations together
customer_reviews.author: AFS

customer_reviews.title: Need a gift to impress and delight.
customer_reviews.text: Love the candles and the presentation box. I ordered these as a gift for my daughter but was so impressed I'm keeping your company on my list for "go to" gift ideas. I also will be ordering some for myself, of course. Your printed information about the company and the wick stick make your product more personal and boutique.

product_meta.title: Way Out West Aromatherapy Scented Candles Gift Set - Stress Relief & Energy Jar Candles with 100% Natural Essential Oils Lavender & Eucalyptus Spearmint - Long Burning Soy Wax Candle - USA Made
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR INGREDIENTS – SMALL BATCH CRAFTED: FOR OVER 30 YEARS we've crafted each aromatherapy candle set from the purest soy candle wax blend, essential oils and lead-free cotton candle wicks, for a soothing, welcoming home fragrance that lingers and lasts.

BURN 8 TIMES LONGER – INCREDIBLE VALUE: While most soy candles burn out in a few short hours, Way Out West’s therapeutic candles deliver over 80 hours of bliss to your mind, body and soul. It's like getting 8 bulk scented candle sets for the price of 1.

AMAZING GIFTS – EVERY NON TOXIC CANDLES SET includes 2 (8oz) special candles tucked safely into a beautiful gift box. Simply choose their favorite oil scents (or yours), click add to cart, enter their address, and send a gift that shows your thoughtfulness every time they light it.

COZY INVITING WARMTH – THE PERFECT WAY TO CREATE AMBIANCE, tranquility, happiness, and inner peace in any space. DÉCOR COMPLIMENTING candles beautifully illuminate any home or apartment – formal, modern, Victorian, country, minimalist and whatever designs your heart dreams up next.

ENJOY OUR "SMELLS Soooo GOOD GUARANTEE." Providing exceptional quality products & top-notch customer service is our #1 priority. We promise you that your candle will always SMELL Soooo GOOD, or we'll provide you a full refund. You can click the yellow "Add to Cart" button today with confidence - knowing that you are getting the best candles.
